description:
This course gives you the latest most cutting-edge information about creating and editing videos for your online courses, training programs or webinars.

Creating videos for students, clients and customers to learn from can be painstaking!

This course takes away all of the overwhelm that comes with choosing the right equipment, software and programs. You'll find swipe files of the exact equipment and software that are the most preferred in the industry.

This course includes 7 training videos and 3 worksheets for your learning style, and is a portion of the full course, Put Your "SASS" Online available through FOUNDationYOUâ„¢.

If you've ever struggled with figuring out which camera to use, what lighting kit to get, what editing software to use, or how to even edit your videos so they look smooth and seamless, then this is the course for YOU!
title: Create Awesome Videos, Audio & PDF's for Your Courses
